dmca.title: [EV1-C1705517O] Takedown request http://www.unknown-insanity.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Wednesday, November 08, 2006 2:32 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1705517O] Takedown request http://www.unknown-insanity.com Subject: [EV1-C1705517O] Takedown request http://www.unknown-insanity.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Takedown request http://www.unknown-insanity.com Added by system at Tuesday, Nov 7 2006 05:41 am X-MailFrom: pat.adams@ibo.org X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Nov 7 05:40:03 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 7 Nov 2006 05:39:17 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 07 Nov 2006 05:39:17 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from pat.adams@ibo.org) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GhPIT-0006DK-CW for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 07 Nov 2006 05:39:17 -0600 Received: from imap.ibo.org ([194.82.135.53]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from pat.adams@ibo.org) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GhPIR-000NiT-9m for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 07 Nov 2006 05:39:15 -0600 Received: from [172.16.11.96] ([172.16.11.96]) by imap.ibo.org (Netscape Messaging Server 4.15) with ESMTP id J8CZ1A00.D5C; Tue, 7 Nov 2006 11:39:10 +0000 Message-ID: <4550705E.8040008@ibo.org> Date: Tue, 07 Nov 2006 11:39:10 +0000 From: "Pat Adams" User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.5 (Windows/20060719) MIME-Version: 1.0 To: abuse@theplanet.com CC: Graham Eglinton Subject: Takedown request http://www.unknown-insanity.com Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="------------030803040107020002020802" Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 194.82.135.53 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of ibo.org) client-ip=194.82.135.53; envelope-from=pat.adams@ibo.org; helo=imap.ibo.org; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 07 Nov 2006 11:39:17.0829 (UTC) FILETIME=[5BC85F50:01C70261] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear administrator I have to bring the following site to your attention http://www.unknown-insanity.com and in particular the page that contains numerous pdf files that are the copyright of the International Baccalaureate Organization: http://www.unknown-insanity.com/ibuploader/uploads/ Use of this material is, of course, breaking copyright law and, in addition, causing a lot of difficulty to schools around the world that want to use these files legitimately. You are the ISP of this personal website and I request that you close the site down until the offending files are removed. I look forward to hearing from you. Yours . Pat Adams -- IBO LOGO*Pat Adams* *Rights manager Publications group* * pat.adams@ibo.org ( +44 (29) 2054 7733 8 IB store (multipart/related) MIME element (text/html) Dear administrator

I have to bring the following site to your attention http://www.unknown-insanity.com and in particular the page that contains numerous pdf files that are the copyright of the International Baccalaureate Organization: http://www.un known-insanity.com/ibuploader/uploads/

Use of this material is, of course, breaking copyright law and, in addition, causing a lot of difficulty to schools around the world that want to use these files legitimately. You are the ISP of this personal website and I request that you close the site down until the offending files are removed.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Yours
.
Pat Adams
--
Signature
